title: Claire McCaskill | Sherrod Brown | Roger Stone Indicted as Trump Caves on Shutdown: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump caving on the signature promise of his campaign and one of his closest advisers getting indicted in the Russia investigation.

Then, Seth talks to former senator Claire McCaskill about being the first senator to join Twitter, her thoughts on whether the Democratic Party should move toward more moderate or progressive politics and the connection between Alex Trebek and her student loans. (10:33) She also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G. (18:19)

After that, Senator Sherrod Brown talks about speaking with President Trump about policy, the ongoing government shutdown and why he thinks the mood of the country is optimistic. (26:21) He also takes a few more additional questions exclusively for this podcast. (36:48)
